PHRASE.LANG: Don’t like bugs? Then this is the head for you. No longer will you be tormented by winged creepy crawlies when wearing this magnificent deterrent. [#Legal]
Vous détestez les insectes ? Cette tête est faite pour vous. Finis les problèmes avec les bestioles ailées grâce à ce magnifique insecticide. [#Legal]
Du hasst Insekten? Dann ist dies der richtige Kopf für dich. Mit dieser wunderbaren Abschreckwaffe kommen dir diese geflügelten Widerlinge sicher nicht mehr in die Quere.[#Legal]
Non ami gli insetti? Allora questa testa fa per te! Non verrai più tormentato da fastidiosi insetti con le ali quando indosserai questo fantastico deterrente! [#Legal]
¿No te gustan los bichos? Entonces esta es tu cabeza. Cuando lleves puesto este magnífico disuasorio, esos bichos voladores y asquerosos ya no te volverán a atormentar. [#Legal]
벌레를 싫어하신다고요? 그렇다면 이 머리가 당신에게 딱입니다. 이 멋진 머리를 착용하면 더 이상 날개 달린 벌레들로부터 괴롭힘을 당하지 않아도 됩니다. [#Legal]
Don’t like bugs? Then this is the head for you. No longer will you be tormented by winged creepy crawlies when wearing this magnificent deterrent. [#Legal]
不喜歡蟲子？那麼這是一款適合你的頭套。當戴著這一極品防蟲裝備時，會飛的爬蟲不再會侵擾你。[#Legal]
不喜歡蟲子？那麼這是一款適合你的頭套。當戴著這一極品防蟲裝備時，會飛的爬蟲不再會侵擾你。[#Legal]
Don’t like bugs? Then this is the head for you. No longer will you be tormented by winged creepy crawlies when wearing this magnificent deterrent. [#Legal]
